languages.text: {n}Янрис оправляет камзол, прежде чем обратиться к вам.{/n} "Итак, Лорд-капитан... приступим к делам? У нас много тем для обсуждения".
{n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."
languages.original_text: {n}Янрис оправляет камзол, прежде чем обратиться к вам.{/n} "Итак, Лорд-капитан... приступим к делам? У нас много тем для обсуждения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."

{n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."

languages.text: {n}丹罗克整理了一下自己的衣领，随后开了口。{/n}“好了，舰长大人……咱们来谈正事吧？有很多事情需要向您汇报。”
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."

traits.locale_text: {n}丹罗克整理了一下自己的衣领，随后开了口。{/n}“好了，舰长大人……咱们来谈正事吧？有很多事情需要向您汇报。”

languages.text: {n}Danrok richtet seine Jacke, ehe er dich anspricht.{/n} "Nun denn, Lord Captain ... Wollen wir zur Sache kommen? Es gibt einiges zu besprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok richtet seine Jacke, ehe er dich anspricht.{/n} "Nun denn, Lord Captain ... Wollen wir zur Sache kommen? Es gibt einiges zu besprechen."

languages.text: {n}Danrok ajuste sa veste avant de parler.{/n} « Bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Et si nous nous mettions au travail ? Nous avons un certain nombre de sujets à aborder. »
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok ajuste sa veste avant de parler.{/n} « Bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Et si nous nous mettions au travail ? Nous avons un certain nombre de sujets à aborder. »

languages.text: {n}Danrok se ajusta la chaqueta antes de dirigirse a ti.{/n} «Bueno, Lord Capitán... ¿vamos al grano? Tenemos varios asuntos que tratar».
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok se ajusta la chaqueta antes de dirigirse a ti.{/n} «Bueno, Lord Capitán... ¿vamos al grano? Tenemos varios asuntos que tratar».

languages.text: {n}ダンロックは上着を整え、あなたに話しかける。{/n}「ではロード・キャプテン…仕事に取りかかりますか？いくつか確認しておきたいことがあります」
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."

traits.locale_text: {n}ダンロックは上着を整え、あなたに話しかける。{/n}「ではロード・キャプテン…仕事に取りかかりますか？いくつか確認しておきたいことがあります」

languages.text: {n}Danrok, ceketini düzeltip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ee Lord Kaptan... Başlayalım mı? Elimizde ilgilenilmesi gereken birkaç mesele var."
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok adjusts his jacket before addressing you.{/n} "Now then, Lord Captain... Shall we get to business? We have a number of items to go over."
